label.title: Vanity URL Dashboard

moveInfo.content: Mapping to this page will be removed on publication of {{pagePath}}

publish.title: Publish confirmation
publish.content: Are you sure you want to publish vanity URLs selected? The publication will be started as a background job.

delete.title: Delete confirmation
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete vanity URLs selected?

move.title: Move Mapping
move.content: Please enter the path to where you want to point ...
move.confirm: I understand that this move is a one way ticket !!

publishdeletion.title: Delete Live Mappings
publishdeletion.headline: You are about to delete multiple Live Mapping URLs
publishdeletion.content: It is not possible to delete Live Mappings individually, so please note that all of the following Live Mappings will be removed
publishdeletion.terms: I understand that once it has been deleted, it is gone. Forever.

errors.mappingAlreadyExist: URL Mapping is already used on {{existingNodePath}}

label.publicationDeletionConfirmed: Deletion confirmed, publication job started in background
